title: What's new in v2.0.1
content:
Pixquare is now a freemium app with in-app purchase. No subscription!
Those who bought the app before will still have access to all features.

Fixes:
  - Blend mode not working with clipping mask
  - Pixel misalignment for a few users (option in the Features menu)
  - Rare crash when importing .aseprite file with reference image
  - Rare instances where users are stuck on the first screen
